title: Bile Sample Collection for the analysis of extracellular RNA
procedures:
1. Bile is collected from drainage bags from patients with an indwelling biliary tube into a sterile collection bottle.
  2. Centrifuge for 10 minutes at 3000g at 4°C to remove any cellular sediment and debris.
  3. Aliquot into 1 ml aliquots in microcentrifuge tubes.
  4. Store at -20°C.
